title: Idea to stop bots in LOL - Captcha
body:
Hi Riot,

Still having many games these days with farming bots, I'm guessing because I'm not as high a level as other players. As an idea you could use captcha codes at the start of each game during the selection screen.

Thanks.

replies.body: That would be great, expect that the players that use these bots get in game first then apply the bot.
